name: Cancun, Mexico
description: Cancun is a popular beach destination known for its beautiful white sand beaches, crystal clear waters, and lively nightlife.

name: Koh Samui, Thailand
description: Koh Samui is a tropical paradise with stunning beaches, warm waters perfect for swimming, and plenty of water activities to enjoy.

name: Miami, Florida
description: Miami is a vibrant city with beautiful beaches, perfect for swimming, and a variety of water sports to try. It also offers a wide range of accommodation options, including condos.

name: Bali, Indonesia
description: Bali is a popular destination for beach lovers, with its stunning coastline, warm waters, and variety of water activities. Condos can be found at affordable prices.
